ComicInfo.Title: Rebirth!
ComicInfo.Summary: Rebirth!: The Absorbing Man returns to Earth. Loki’s voice, in his head, urges him to seek out and attack Thor. Absorbing Man first attacks and defeats Hildegarde and Sif. Then Thor fights him and gets the better of him, causing him to flee. He is drawn to Tom Fagan’s house, where Loki awaits.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:24:18. [Issue ID 25746]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
